definition: tui na (form of Chinese manual therapy)
to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage
to hold/to seize/to catch/to apprehend/to take/(used in the same way as 把[ba3]: to mark the following noun as a direct object)

sentences.english: I also do the deep breathing and self-massage mentioned above as I do so.
sentences.chinese: 在閒步中也做上文提到的深呼吸和自我推拿運動。

sentences.english: The osteopath carefully manipulated my damaged shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 整骨醫生仔細而又熟練地給我推拿受傷的肩。

sentences.english: It indicates that wrist-ankle acupuncture combinated massage ha…
sentences.chinese: 說明腕踝針配合推拿治療肩周炎療效好。
那個按摩師給我推拿了背。

sentences.english: Massage the scalp, improve blood circulation, prevent hair white.
sentences.chinese: 推拿頭皮，改進血循環，防備頭髮變白。

sentences.english: Treat yourself to a massage or spa day.
sentences.chinese: 去做做推拿或者泡泡溫泉，犒勞一下自己。

sentences.english: LeEr feet like twisted, cloud crazy for her massage.
sentences.chinese: 樂兒的腳好像扭到了，雲狂給她推拿。

sentences.english: Conclusion This method might have certain effect to treat peripheral facial palsy.
sentences.chinese: 結論電針配合推拿治療周圍性面神經麻痹療效肯定。

sentences.english: Our shop is the ancestral manipulation.
sentences.chinese: 本店是祖傳推拿手法店。

sentences.english: Sensual massage and foot rub are great way to help relax her body.
sentences.chinese: 撩人地推拿和足底按摩是幫助她放鬆身體的好方法。

sentences.english: Massage is not used for dermatosis with pathologic changes and injuries, bruise and scald.
sentences.chinese: 皮膚病病變損害處，皮開肉綻及燙傷處一般不宜推拿。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the curative effect of periarthritis of shoulder with the massage and cupping.
sentences.chinese: 目的推拿配合火罐對治療肩周炎的療效。

sentences.english: It bases on biology mechanics theory and herbalist doctor's massage correctitude bone theory .
sentences.chinese: 它根據生物力學原理及中醫推拿正骨原理設計面成。

sentences.english: Conclusion Massage therapy has excellent effectiveness in the treatment of nape and back pain in lactation.
sentences.chinese: 結論推拿療法治療哺乳性頸背疼痛症療效顯著。

sentences.english: Her dislocated shoulder was carefully manipulated back into place.
sentences.chinese: 她脫臼的肩關節經小心推拿而復位。

sentences.english: If you need massage, please dail 6969.
sentences.chinese: 假如要推拿服務，請撥打6969。

definition: acupuncture and moxibustion/to give or have acupuncture and moxibustion
cupping glass/fire cupping (acupressure technique of Chinese medicine, with fired vacuum cup applied to the skin)/ventouse (vacuum method used in obstetrics)
form of therapeutic massage, mainly for children, in which a roll of skin is squeezed, working from the base of the spine to the neck (TCM)
to give or have an acupuncture treatment
suction cup (used in Chinese medicine to draw the blood and qi 氣|气)/detachable suction chimney to make a stove draw
to hit a pressure point (martial arts)/dim mak/see also 點脈|点脉[dian3 mai4]
to nurse one's health/to recuperate/to take care of/to look after/to discipline/to educate/to train/to prepare food/(dialect) to make fun of/(medicine) to opsonize
